title: Erich Heins
text:
Erich Heins (born November 1, 1907, in <a href="Hamburg">Hamburg</a>; died June 26, 1944, in Hamburg Remand Prison) was a <a href="Germans">German</a> <a href="communist">communist</a> and resistance fighter against the Nazis and a Nazi Victim.
Life.
Heins came from a Hamburg <a href="worker">worker</a> family. After visiting the <a href="elementary%20school">elementary school</a>, he learned the trade of <a href="Locksmith">Locksmith</a> and worked in the shipyard of <a href="Blohm%20%26amp%3B%20Voss">Blohm & Voss</a>. He entered the <a href="Communist%20Party">Communist Party</a> (KPD), then joined the <a href="Roter%20Frontk%C3%A4mpferbund">Roter Frontkämpferbund</a> (RFB) and was active against the upcoming <a href="Nazism">Nazism</a>. After the <a href="seizure">transfer of power to the NSDAP</a> he continued this <a href="Crime">illegal</a> activity. When the <a href="Gestapo">Gestapo</a> became aware that in his apartment the Rotfrontkämpfer <a href="Resistance%20movement">conspiratorial</a> met, he was taken for three months in "<a href="protective%20custody">protective custody</a>"
In the early 1940s he took at the shipyard, where he worked, connection to the resistance group Bästlein Jacob Abshagen who were interested in foreign <a href="forced%20labor%20in%20the%20era%20of%20National%20Socialism">forced labor</a> he used that have been supplied in the war from Eastern Europe. Political Enlightenment about the actual war events and <a href="sabotage">sabotage</a> negotiations among their resistance activities. When this power the Nazi authorities had become known through treachery, Hein and several other of his associates were arrested in May 1944 and in the "Hamburg Communists processes " from the <a href="People%27s%20Court%20%28Germany%29">People's Court</a> <a href="death">sentenced to death</a>. Erich Hein was executed on June 26, 1944 along with Karl Kock, Hans Köpke, Ernst Mittelbach, Walter Reber, Wilhelm Stein, Paul Thürey, Kurt Vopahl and Oskar Voss Detention " Holsten glacis " executed with the <a href="guillotine">guillotine</a>.
